website_summaries.verdict: A great collector's set with a wide variety of small Care Bear figures.
pros: Features 14 different Care Bear figures that are each 3-inches tall
The arms on each figure move and the toys are great for imaginative play
cons: Not ideal for babies or young toddlers since they are small

customer_reviews.title: Small parts Swallow hazard
customer_reviews.text: I really like these toys, however, they really do have small parts, that tea do come apart. I think the tail may have been swallowed. Most are still intact, for now.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Schatzlein

customer_reviews.title: Beware - the description is not accurate for the product pictured
customer_reviews.text: I do like it - but I am rating this as "I don't like it" because the product description specifically states: "This deluxe pack of figures features 14 of your favorite care bears characters as articulated 3" figures, including the rare Sakura figure found exclusively in this set!" & this was not included in this pack. When zooming in the product pictured, this is what I received but again, the description is wrong which is super disappointing. To be fair, what I did get is of good quality & nice for toddler aged kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: MRock

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 2 year olds birthday. I love that they are so fun and colorful. They also have no little pieces and they don’t hold water so they can be played with in the bath too. My 4 yo daughter loved them too and my 6 yo son (because there are boy care bears too). It was a much better toy than I expected. We used The bears for her rainbow cake too.
customer_reviews.author: KDVMV

customer_reviews.title: These are colorful and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have care bear saved from when my 35 year old daughter was a child. It is a little bit larger than these but these are made from the same durable material with moveable arms. My 4 year old granddaughter loves them. I live about 2 hours away and give her a new one each time I visit. I think there were about 20 in the box set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute bears, but not made as well as they used to be
customer_reviews.text: my kids love these care bears. very cute and the arms move. but, they are smaller and less well-made than the plastic care bears i had in the 80’s as a child. the plastic is smooth (not textured), the painted design on the belly scratches easily, they tip over easily, the legs don’t move. overall they are just cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: emily p

customer_reviews.title: Duplicate bears in set
customer_reviews.text: We got two of the same bears in our package. We are missing sunshine bear.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Caring and Sharing
customer_reviews.text: Although these were more of a funny gift for teachers, they were awesome! Our grade level team ordered shirts from Amazon and dressed up like the Care Bears for Halloween. I then found these fun miniatures of "us" and gave them out as a gift. Yes, it "broke up" the set, but it's all in good fun. Teachers now have them sitting in their classrooms with our grade level picture from Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: DocK

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute. I ordered them as a decoration for my office, for that purpose the quality isn’t great (I thought they’d be more similar to my childhood toys I had of the care bears and their cousins, in the 80s - they’re not). That being said; they’re cute and kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: EFF

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.  You will love these if you love Care Bears
customer_reviews.text: Very nice display. Arrived in perfect condition. Cuter n larger n better quality than was expecting. Bought to put in pencil packs for OCC shoebox gifts. A bit challenging to remove from packaging. I was able to remove without damaging them. Just so cute!
customer_reviews.author: ABC123Quality

customer_reviews.title: One came broken but the rest were great
customer_reviews.text: They were really cute and my daughter loved them but one of them fell apart as soon as we took it out. Other than that they worked great as potty training rewards for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.author: Lauren O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Care Bears Fugurines- wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has two plush Care Bears and has been asking for more. This set is the perfect hold over and they fit perfectly in her little purse or dollhouse! She loved meeting all of the new characters she hadn’t seen before.
customer_reviews.author: K Wells

customer_reviews.title: Cute little Care Bears
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my toys from the 80's and these reproduction Care Bear figures are super cute. Nothing too fancy, but super cute. They are shinier and smaller than the original 80's versions. If there was one thing I would improve upon, I would like to see the little lines in these that give the appearance of fur.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these for Care Bear centerpieces at my daughter's first birthday party. Packaging arrived very neat and clean, the figurines themselves do not have any visible imperfections. We'll update review with photos when the party happens.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Value
customer_reviews.text: Well made, cute, as pictured and described. My daughter is at the age where she loves figures and toys that fit in her hand. Great price for several cute well made toys.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Flores

customer_reviews.title: missing a bear
customer_reviews.text: My set of 14 included only 13 bears. There's an empty bear-shaped plastic space where Best Friend Bear should be. :(
customer_reviews.author: Anna Henson

customer_reviews.title: So cute and the kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute I bought these for my daughter to play with and she loves these she’s only 9 months but she loves playing with these Care Bears she takes them with her all around the house and my 1 year old son also loves playing with them as well. He fights her over these lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie  B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a birthday present for my child. They absolutely enjoyed them. Good quality plastic and sturdy. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT!! I was expecting them to be smaller and loved that they were bigger. They are stocking stuffers for 2 little girls.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie E. Alefi

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: They are made from a cheaper plastic than what I was expecting. And I wasn't aware that only the arms move not the head or legs. Still nice toys but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: PR Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Cute Care Bears
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and actually perfect for my toddlers little hands. The arms move, but the legs do not and some of the paint wears off over time.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gray

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These bears are very well made and super cute! My niece is three and loved them. I would definitely gift them again!
customer_reviews.author: strollinbfarm

customer_reviews.title: No thanks.
customer_reviews.text: kind of cheesy, not sure exactly what I was expecting. These bears look like something you would purchase from the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P.

customer_reviews.title: super cute, great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. They are super cute 80s style care bears. They are fairly sturdy, but I wouldn't be too rough with them due to the arms and tail. The arms move. I absolutely love these as they remind me of my childhood.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Schnaible

customer_reviews.title: joyful
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old daughter, loves these! She plays with them in the car, the kitchen, the sandbox, and the bath tub. The arms move and the heart on the butt is cute!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Cute for decorations only
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter to play with - but they aren't bendable and are hard to play with. Like I stated above, they are cute for displaying.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Used for potty training reward!
customer_reviews.text: Used as a potty training bribe, each time my daughter used the potty she received one! Worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: KZambranny

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my niece. It came in a nice box and wrapped. Size of bears are about 3” each. A great value. Bears look as they should. Not cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, smaller than my originals and not as soft but still cute.
customer_reviews.author: Crunchy Star

customer_reviews.title: Made perfect party decorations and toys. Birthday girl loves the !
customer_reviews.text: Used these to decorate a cake and the table for birthday party. They also make great party favors. All the kids loved them! Item as described. Priced right. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really Cute and worth the money. I plan on donating these at Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a little collector and loves this sweet set.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dyer

customer_reviews.title: item as described
customer_reviews.text: very cute set. best price here compared to other stores. as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THEM SO MUCH THEY ARE SO CUTE THANKS
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Brought a big smile to my seven year old, who immediately started posting off the names of each bear.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! They're such a great size and the little arms move.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect last minute gift
customer_reviews.text: I found these 2 days before Christmas and luckily could get them delivered for our daughters early morning gift opening. She plays with these in her doll house every day and makes up all kinds of stories about them. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and easy to stand up. I wish it cam with a list, I always forget the names
customer_reviews.author: nicole mcewen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughters loved getting these!! So fun to play with!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy these again
customer_reviews.text: They're beautiful, they don't have movable legs though. Also the plastic is a lot cheaper then it use to be for these dolls. Worth the buy though, my daughter loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Bears to share!
customer_reviews.text: This was great to have on hand for the holidays. I was able to allow the children in my life pick out 2 or three to take home when they visited. The parents approved because the Care Bears share such a great message of kindness and working together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute set!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set! It’s a Christmas gift, but my 4 year old girls love the Care Bears, so they will love this!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Shuba

customer_reviews.title: neat find
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this again. More of a collector item for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cute Care Bears
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loved these cute Care Bears, she is 16 months old. She has carried them everywhere with her.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Foster

customer_reviews.title: A++++++
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to give to my daughter for Christmas. She will love them
customer_reviews.author: Love Never Fails

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what was shown.
customer_reviews.text: All toys were in good shape but one of the bears was doubled up and was missing the yellow bear. Looks like seller flopped one from another set that may have been lost? That was disappointing for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carabine

customer_reviews.title: Grandson likes
customer_reviews.text: 2 1/2 year old Grandson happy with this. Likes to line them up.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Perez

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! The quality and colors are exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Harper

customer_reviews.title: Chinese checkers replacement marbles
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glass marbles! My husbands grandfather Homemade an aggravation and Chinese checkers board. These marbles are perfect! Something we can hand down to generations! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa McClain

customer_reviews.title: Great success
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my baby niece for Christmas and she loved them. A big hit
customer_reviews.author: Carol Damon

customer_reviews.title: Well put together
customer_reviews.text: They were so cute grandkids love them. Well built sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stripling

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These little bears are darling, and well-made. Arrived on-time and in perfect condition. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Lou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for emotional awareness
customer_reviews.text: I’m mental health therapist and Care Bears are perfect to use in therapist about social emotional awareness. My kiddos love them
customer_reviews.author: Misty andrews

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves the Care Bears
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size, easy to wash, very colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lebda

customer_reviews.title: Missing Tail
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but one Care Bear is missing a tail -right out of the box. We are keeping it but it’s disappointing for sure!
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Stong, durable, and any age friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great toys for my granddaughter and for my students in my classroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, no Sweet Sakura Bear
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I did receive the item pictured (the set including the purple Rainbow Heart Bear). But, I wanted the item noted in the written description (the set including the pink Sweet Sakura Bear).
customer_reviews.author: Girly Girl

product_meta.title: Just Play Care Bears Collector Set- Figures Toy Figure
product_meta.description: Take the magic of Care-a-Lot home with you with this amazing care bears collector's set. This deluxe pack of figures features 14 of your favorite care bears characters as articulated 3" figures, including the rare Sakura figure found exclusively in this set! a true collectors dream!
feature_bullets: Take the magic of Care-a-Lot home with you with this amazing care bears collector's set. This deluxe pack of figures features 14 of your favorite care bears characters as articulated 3" figures, including the rare Sakura figure found exclusively in this set. A true collectors dream

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars482 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
